snippet.title: Virtua Cop 2 gameplay (PC Game, 1996)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Virtua Cop 2 (aka virtua squad 2), PC game produced by SEGA in 1996 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/virtua-cop-2/1844/
Superb arcade-action... gun will be simulated by mouse but the fun will be the same.
Played through emulated Windows (Win 98/Win XP) virtual machine.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Virtua Cop - https://youtu.be/hSF3vD6l6rA
Rise of the Triad: The HUNT Begins - https://youtu.be/eHn7uO7ILog
